channel.title: asterisk on A haven for Unix & Linux deviants
channel.description: Recent content in asterisk on A haven for Unix & Linux deviants

item.title: plumTrack - A intresting new project from the Systrax team...
Digium AsteriskWorld 2008
item.description: Digium AsteriskWorld (Part of the VON.x Conference) This has been a fun event so far. We have been fed on a regular basis, and Pulvermedia has sprung for the Top-Shelf Liquor. I did get to spend a lot of time with Marc Spencer w/ Digium. Great guy, and soooo damn young! I have a few more hours here before catching a plane, so lets see what-else this conference has in store.

item.title: Road to AsteriskWorld
item.description: One other thing. I am going to be in the San Jose area next-week for the AsteriskWorld convention. Its going to be a fun time, and I am hoping to meet some like-minded individuals! (Networking Rocks!) BTW… I am posting more of my ramblings on my Twitter page! Please feel free to join my ring, and I will join yours! (We can all play nice right?)

item.title: March 2008 Update
item.description: Havent updated this in a while… but I promise to add more content! Just as an FYI of what I have been working on in the past 6 - 9 months: Implementing a 300+ user Asterisk Implementation Re-vising the companies SOX controls. Creating new IT Procedures, revising old ones. Finishing up a massive NetBackup deployment. Completing an Internal Process Walkthrough. (One every year!) Planning our VMWare V3i implementation. Trying to stay afloat!
